Articles.Content:
Hey there!

I've been playing since 0.18.4 and used the information here so much! I guess it's time to come share what I learned too.

Happy explosions ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)
Welcome aboard! Yes yes, come and share, I'm always hunting for information!

> 
> Hey there!
> I've been playing since 0.18.4 and used the information here so much! I guess it's time to come share what I learned too.
> 
> Happy explosions ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)

Welcome!
